statements: UPDATE EmployeeAvailabilityData SET availability_weekday='Monday', availability_start_time='09:00:00', availability_end_time='17:00:00' WHERE employee_id=1;
UPDATE EmployeeAvailabilityData SET availability_weekday='Friday', availability_start_time='10:30:00', availability_end_time='18:30:00' WHERE employee_id=2;
UPDATE EmployeeAvailabilityData SET availability_start_time = '08:00:00', availability_end_time = '17:00:00', employee_name = 'John Doe' WHERE employee_id = 123
UPDATE EmployeeAvailabilityData SET availability_weekday = 'Monday',employee_name = 'Jane Smith', availability_start_time = '09:00:00', availability_end_time = '18:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 456
UPDATE Employees SET employee_name = 'John Doe' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE Meetings SET meeting_topic = 'Project Kickoff' WHERE meeting_id = 3;
UPDATE Employees SET employee_name = 'John Doe', availability_time = '09:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE Meetings SET meeting_date = '2022-05-10', meeting_time = '15:30:00', meeting_topic = 'Project Review' WHERE meeting_id = 5;
UPDATE Employees SET availability_start_time = '2023-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE Trainings SET max_attendees = 20, training_start_time = '14:00:00' WHERE training_id = 3;

UPDATE Trainings SET training_start_time = '14:00:00', training_end_time = '16:00:00', max_attendees = 25 WHERE training_id = 5;
UPDATE TeamMembers SET employee_name = 'John Doe' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE TeamAvailability SET start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '17:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 1 AND date = '2022-10-15';

UPDATE Meetings SET description = 'Quarterly Review Meeting' WHERE meeting_id = 201;

UPDATE Employees SET email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Meetings SET attendees = 'John Doe, Jane Smith' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE Team_Members SET team_id = 2, employee_id = 3 WHERE member_id = 5;
